career.name: Freelancer at UpWork
career.title: Android & Web Developer (Contract)
description: Developed and maintained Android applications using Kotlin and Java, focusing on performance, clean UI, and integration with RESTful APIs.
Built responsive and dynamic websites using modern frontend frameworks (React, Vue) and backend technologies (Node.js, PHP, Firebase).

career.name: Itex Global Sourcing
career.title: IT Executive & Web Administrator
description: Designed and developed the official company website to enhance brand presence and client accessibility.
Led IT operations, including system administration, email account setup, and troubleshooting for office staff.
Implemented and maintained digital infrastructure for order management, sales reporting, and internal workflow automation.
Provided technical support and ensured secure, consistent operation of all IT-related systems.
